content.issue: E2E tests failing with 404 errors - compiled JS files missing .js extensions in import statements
content.rootCause: TypeScript compiles to JS without .js extensions, but browsers require them for ES modules
content.solution: Add .js extensions to all relative import statements in compiled JavaScript files
content.testCommand: cd e2e-tests && npx playwright test --grep 'should load MusicalConductor package from Git repository'
